author: Zephyrkul (Zephyrkul#1089)
install_msg:
This cog has no commands. Use the core `[p]autoimmune` command to configure who is immune to this cog.
This cog forces itself to be disabled in all guilds by default. Use `[p]command enablecog AntiGifV` to enable it per-guild.
This does not delete links: it only suppresses embeds. Remember to warn your users not to click on suspicious links.
name: AntiGifV
short: Automatically suppress any GifV embeds. Useful if your system cannot handle the anticrashvid cog.
description: Automatically suppress any GifV embeds. Useful if your system cannot handle the anticrashvid cog.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store any data or metadata about users.
